fontSizeTip: The default font size is 16px, this setting only affects the font size display in the editor
newNameFile: The name of the new document is
newContentFile: The content of the new document is
refExpired: Failed to query the content block pointed to by the ID
generatedMultipleBlocks: Editing has generated multiple blocks, does not support saving
editHistorySaveInterval: Automatically save editing history interval (minutes, set to 0 to disable version management), it will take effect after restart
autoUpdateTip: The available update package will be downloaded automatically After enabling
appearance11: shrink to the tray after clicking the close button
noRepos: The cloud has not synchronized repos
firstImport:
🎉 This is the first time you open this folder through SiYuan, we need to complete some import work:

  • Automatically convert [[link#heading|text]] to ((id "text"))
  • Automatically convert #tag to #tag#
  • Generate the converted .sy.md file

Please select a storage folder for the converted document to complete the import.
account5: Copy and paste to WeChat MP, ZhiHu
account0: The first 512 early supporters will get $20 to purchase lifetime membership
md13: After the editor width is greater than this value, the left and right sides remain blank
accountTip:
By continuing, you agree to the
LianDi Community Agreement and Privacy Terms
appearance6: The window layout will be restored to the initial state after reset
appearance7: Automatically switch with sunrise and sunset
appearance5: Select the mode of the user interface
appearance3: Select the syntax highlighting theme used in dark mode
appearance2: Select the syntax highlighting theme used in light mode
md12: After enabling, the code block will be rendered in time when editing
md15: After enabling, the math block will be rendered in time when editing
md16: Keep the block ID when closing the program
md17: Keeping the block ID permanently can ensure that the shared block-level URL is not invalid
md1: Automatically insert spaces between Chinese and Western (English, Arabic numerals and symbols, etc.) when entering
md2: The spelling of terms is automatically replaced when inputting. Currently, the term definition table is built-in, mainly related to programming
md3: When inputting, the English punctuation after Chinese is automatically replaced with the corresponding Chinese punctuation, such as 中文, English replaced with 中文，English
md4: Automatically indent the beginning of paragraphs when previewing to conform to traditional Chinese typesetting habits
md5: For example, $100 does not want to be rendered as a mathematical formula $200. After enabling $100 does not want to be rendered as a mathematical formula $ will be recognized as a formula
md6: MathJax has better compatibility, and KaTex has better performance
md7: After enabling, the editor toolbar will be hidden
md8: After enabling, it will recognize the [toc] grammar and generate an in-page outline block
md9: After enabling, it will recognize the footnote syntax and generate a footnote block
md10: After enabling, it will recognize the mark syntax, you can use ==Mark== to highlight the mark text
md18: Support image url path with spaces
md19: After enabling, spaces will be allowed in the image or link path, that is, there is no need to use %20, it will take effect after restart
fileTree1: After enabling, click (ie select) the document and it will open in the editor tab
fileTree2: The file tree will automatically select the current document when the editor tab is switched
fileTree4: Display the assets folder on the file tree and list the resource files
fileTree5: The storage path of the newly created document when using block reference
fileTree6: For example /folder1/folder2/, if it does not start with /, the relative path of the current folder is used
fileTree8: The newly opened document tab will replace the unmodified tab
graph1: In the case of many nodes, some nodes will be reduced in order to improve rendering efficiency, and will not affect search results
graph2: Filter nodes based on the number of references, this is only the default value, which can be dynamically adjusted on the relationship graph
image1: After enabling and pasting (cutting) the copied web content, the pictures will be automatically pulled to the local
export14: Please fill in the left and the right anchor text wrapping symbol in the input box
export11: Content handling of content block references when exporting Markdown
export12: After enabling, a Markdown file of document_name.export.md will be automatically generated when saving the document
theme11: Select the theme used in dark mode
theme12: Select the icons used in light mode
theme14: After enabling, the customized theme will be used, and after closing, the original theme will be used
theme2: Select the icons used in the user interface
language1: Select the display language of the user interface
saveTip: is not save, confirm close it?
paragraphBeginningSpace: Two empty spaces at the beginning of the paragraph
slogan: When one drinks water, one must not forget where it comes from
about1:
Copyright (c) 2020-present, ld246.com
SiYuan is a commercial software developed by Yunnan LianDi Technology Ltd.

Before v1.0.0, all functions are free to use.
After v1.0.0 is released, some advanced features require paid subscription.
about3: Please use Chrome browser and keep it on the same network as your computer
about6: After configuration, it will be used as the access authentication password (user name is always siyuan), leave it blank to disable authentication
autoSpace: Automatically insert spaces between Chinese and Western languages
chinesePunctuation: Chinese punctuation is automatically replaced with Chinese punctuation
inlineMathDigit: Allow inline math formulas to follow numbers
autoFetch: Auto fetch remote image to local
downloadTip: The browser does not support the download function
performanceTip: Real-time preview requires ${x}ms, you can close it
record-tip: The device does not support recording
title: Title
